flex.title: Flexible Rate (Refundable)
bullets: Cancel free by 15:00 three full days before arrival.

policies.title: Policies & deposits
items: City/tourist tax: €2.50 per guest per night (added at checkout).
Keycard & linen deposit: €10 cash at check‑in; refunded on return.
Safeguarding hold: Up to one night per guest at check‑in (or equivalent cash). If neither is possible, the booking is cancelled.
Cancellation admin fee: typically 15% of booking price (excluding third‑party commissions).
Reception closes 22:30; no‑show charge is the higher of first night or the non‑refundable deposit.
policies.footer: Final availability and payment are completed on our official booking engine.
